title: Futbol Americas: J.C. Osorio disapproves Tata skipping El Tri practice
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar preview the USMNT's game against Saudi Arabia. Then U.S. goalkeeper Matt Turner has a one-on-one sit down with Alexis Nunes where he discusses the USMNT's loss against Japan, and the 'golden generation' tag placed on the national team. Next, Juan Carlos Osorio joins the show to recap Mexico's win against Peru. Then the guys recap the weekend action in NWSL. Who will make the playoffs?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: The Mexico National Team head coach watches the Argentina game instead
